name: prysm-lukso.dnp.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Prysm implementation for LUKSO Beacon chain + validator
description:
Validate with Prysm in LUKSO: a Go implementation of the Beacon Chain and open source project created by Prysmatic Labs. Beacon node which powers the beacon chain at the core of Ethereum 2.0

It includes a Grafana dashboard for the [DMS](http://my.dappnode/#/installer/dms.dnp.dappnode.eth) thanks to the amazing work of [metanull-operator](https://github.com/metanull-operator/eth2-grafana)
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)

warnings.onRemove: Before deleting this package, make sure your web3signer is not using it to validate, or you will stop validating. You can check it at the Stakers tab
